mapper.delete: UPDATE PCUSER SET deleteStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND deleteStatus = 0
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_pcUser_id.nextval as id from dual

mapper.update:
UPDATE PCUSER
USERNO = #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPTLOGINNAME = #{optloginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISAGENT = #{isagent,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISSALEMAN = #{issaleman,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISMERCHANT = #{ismerchant,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISOPERATOR = #{isoperator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISSITEMANAGER = #{issitemanager,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USERLEVEL = #{userlevel,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USERSTATUS = #{userstatus,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARDNO = #{idcardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARDTYPE = #{idcardtype,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IDCARDEXPIRY = #{idcardexpiry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARDOFFICE = #{idcardoffice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARDADDRESS = #{idcardaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGINPWD = #{loginpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYPWD = #{paypwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISEMAILAUTH = #{isemailauth,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISMOBILEAUTH = #{ismobileauth,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISREALNAMEAUTH = #{isrealnameauth,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LOGINPWDERRORTIMES = #{loginpwderrortimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
PAYPWDERRORTIMES = #{paypwderrortimes,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISINITLOGINPWD = #{isinitloginpwd,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LASTLOGINPWDERRORTIME = #{lastloginpwderrortime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTPAYPWDERRORTIME = #{lastpaypwderrortime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTLOGINTIME = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SITECODE = #{sitecode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DELETESTATUS = #{deletestatus,jdbcType=BIGINT},
AGENTLEVEL = #{agentlevel,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISSMSACCEPT = #{issmsaccept,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ISEMAILACCEPT = #{isemailaccept,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REGISTERFROM = #{registerfrom,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GESTUREPWD = #{gesturepwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_ENCRYPT = #{mobileEncrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARDNO_ENCRYPT = #{idcardnoEncrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEY_NAME = #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE_CODE = #{mobileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FORGET_MOBILE_CODE = #{forgetMobileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FORGET_SEND_TIME = #{forgetSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PWD_MODIFY_TIME = #{pwdModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_RESERVE = #{loginReserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

UPDATE PCUSER SET USERNO = #{userno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTLOGINNAME = #{optloginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISAGENT = #{isagent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISSALEMAN = #{issaleman,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISMERCHANT = #{ismerchant,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISOPERATOR = #{isoperator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISSITEMANAGER = #{ismobileauth,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISREALNAMEAUTH = #{isrealnameauth,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LOGINPWDERRORTIMES = #{loginpwderrortimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PAYPWDERRORTIMES = #{paypwderrortimes,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISINITLOGINPWD = #{isinitloginpwd,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LASTLOGINPWDERRORTIME = #{lastloginpwderrortime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTPAYPWDERRORTIME = #{lastpaypwderrortime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LASTLOGINTIME = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SITECODE = #{sitecode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DELETESTATUS = #{deletestatus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AGENTLEVEL = #{agentlevel,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISSMSACCEPT = #{issmsaccept,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ISEMAILACCEPT = #{isemailaccept,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REGISTERFROM = #{keyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE_CODE = #{mobileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FORGET_MOBILE_CODE = #{forgetMobileCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORGET_SEND_TIME = #{forgetSendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PWD_MODIFY_TIME = #{pwdModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOGIN_RESERVE = #{loginReserve,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql:
us.deleteStatus = 0 AND us.optLoginName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{optloginname}),'%')
OR merch.MERCH_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{optloginname}),'%')
OR agent.AGENT_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{optloginname}),'%')
AND us.ISAGENT =0 AND us.ISMERCHANT = 0
AND merch.MERCH_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{orgnOrMerchName}),'%') OR agent.AGENT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{orgnOrMerchName}),'%')
AND us.realName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{realname}),'%') AND us.userStatus = #{status}
mapper.select:
SELECT us.ID,us.REALNAME,us.MOBILE,us.ISAGENT,us.ISMERCHANT,us.ISOPERATOR,us.EMAIL,us.CREATETIME,us.LOGIN_RESERVE,us.USERLEVEL,us.ISSALEMAN,us.USERNO,us.USERSTATUS,agent.AGENT_ID as orgnId,agent.AGENT_NAME as orgnName,merch.MERCH_ID as merchId, merch.MERCH_NAME as merchName,us.ISREALNAMEAUTH,us.ISMOBILEAUTH,us.ISINITLOGINPWD FROM PCUSER us left join b_agent agent on us.USERNO = agent.AGENT_ID left join b_merch merch on us.USERNO = merch.USER_CODE
ORDER BY createTime DESC

SELECT ba.agent_id as orgnId,ba.agent_name as orgnName,null as merchId,null as merchName,us.REALNAME,us.MOBILE,us.ISAGENT,us.ISMERCHANT,us.ISOPERATOR,us.EMAIL,us.CREATETIME,us.LOGIN_RESERVE,us.USERLEVEL,us.ISSALEMAN,us.USERNO,us.USERSTATUS,us.ID,us.ISREALNAMEAUTH,us.ISMOBILEAUTH,us.ISINITLOGINPWD FROM PCUSER us LEFT JOIN ( select agent_id from b_agent where instr(agent_organization, #{orgnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0 ) agent ON us.USERNO = agent.AGENT_ID INNER JOIN B_AGENT ba ON agent.AGENT_ID = ba.AGENT_ID
UNION SELECT null as orgnId,null as orgnName,mc.merch_id as merchId,mc.merch_name as merchName,us.REALNAME,us.MOBILE,us.ISAGENT,us.ISMERCHANT,us.ISOPERATOR,us.EMAIL,us.CREATETIME,us.LOGIN_RESERVE,us.USERLEVEL,us.ISSALEMAN,us.USERNO,us.USERSTATUS,US.ID,us.ISREALNAMEAUTH,us.ISMOBILEAUTH,us.ISINITLOGINPWD FROM PCUSER us INNER JOIN ( SELECT user_code,merch_id,merch_name FROM B_MERCH merch INNER JOIN ( select agent_id,agent_organization from b_agent where instr(agent_organization, #{agent_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) > 0 ) agent on agent.agent_id = merch.agent_id AND merch.AGENT_ID= #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND merch.CREATE_USER_ID= #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) mc ON us.USERNO = mc.USER_CODE
ORDER BY createTime DESC
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM PCUSER WHERE ID IN
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT S.*,BM.AGENT_ID ORG_CODE FROM PCUSER S LEFT JOIN B_MERCH BM ON BM.USER_CODE=S.USERNO WHERE S.ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
